## SavedObjectsIncrementCounterOptions.initialize property

(default=false) If true, sets all the counter fields to 0 if they don't already exist. Existing fields will be left as-is and won't be incremented.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
initialize?: boolean;
```
